articles.title: Trump Says He Will Consider Pardoning Diddy
articles.description: The president knows the shamed rap mogul and wants to know the facts of the case.
articles.content:
Donald Trump refused to dismiss the possibility of a pardon for Sean "Diddy“ Combs, even though the rap tycoon is currently on trial on sex trafficking and other serious charges.
The president said he was aware that he might be asked for clemency.
“N... [1862 chars]

articles.title: Shakira cancels World Pride 2025 concert in DC
articles.description: One day before the kickoff concert for World Pride 2025 in the nation’s capital, headlining performer Shakira has abruptly canceled due to equipment difficulties.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) — One day before the kickoff concert for World Pride 2025 in the nation’s capital, headlining performer Shakira has abruptly canceled due to equipment difficulties.
“We are deeply disappointed that unforeseen circumstances have forced... [2745 chars]

articles.title: Loretta Swit, who played Houlihan on 'M.A.S.H.,' dies at 87
articles.description: Loretta Swit, who won two Emmy Awards playing Major Margaret Houlihan on the pioneering hit TV series “M.A.S.H.,” has died. She was 87.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) — Loretta Swit, who won two Emmy Awards playing Maj. Margaret Houlihan, the demanding head nurse of a behind-the-lines surgical unit during the Korean War on the pioneering hit TV series “M.A.S.H.,” has died. She was 87.
Publicist Harla... [7842 chars]

articles.title: "Supremely Talented Actor"
articles.description: Alan Alda paid tribute to his longtime 'M*A*S*H' co-star Loretta Swit, who died May 30: "A supremely talented actor" who "made the most of her time here."
articles.content:
Alan Alda, who starred on CBS’ long-running comedy series M*A*S*H alongside Loretta Swit, spoke out Friday after the news of Swit’s death at age 87.
Swit, who played Major Margaret “Hot Lips” Houlihan on all 11 seasons of M*A*S*H from 1972-1983, died... [1509 chars]

articles.title: 'Blacklisted' Crew Sues for Sexual Harassment
articles.description: Three crew members on 'Doctor Odyssey' claim they were victims of on-set sexual harassment and were fired after complaining to management.
articles.content:
Three former crewmembers on the ABC medical series “Doctor Odyssey” are suing 20th Century and its parent company Disney for allegedly enabling an “unchecked campaign of sexual harassment for months” on the set of the series.
In the suit, filed Frida... [2442 chars]

articles.title: Shakira cancels Washington DC concert citing production issues
articles.description: The Colombian pop star says she is "devastated", after also cancelling her previous show in Boston.
articles.content:
Shakira cancels second concert over production issues
The Wherever, Whenever singer said she was "devastated" that the shows "were just not possible this time".

articles.title: 'MASH’ stars Alan Alda, Jamie Farr speak out
articles.description: Alan Alda paid tribute to the "supremely talented" Loretta Swit, who co-starred on "M*A*S*H." The Emmy-winning actress died May 30 at age 87.
articles.content:
Alan Alda has paid respects to his "supremely talented" "M*A*S*H" co-star Loretta Swit, who died May 30 at age 87.

articles.title: 'Doctor Odyssey' Crew Sues Disney for Sexual Harassment
articles.description: The lawsuit details a culture on the set of the medical drama in which the assistant prop master, whose boss was his wife, subjected employees to sexual comments and groping.
articles.content:
Former crewmembers on Doctor Odyssey have sued 20th Television and parent company Disney over alleged sexual harassment and retaliation on the set of the medical drama.
Caroline Mack, Alicia Haverland and Ava Steinbrenner, in a lawsuit filed on Frida... [3598 chars]

articles.title: Angelina Jolie, Brad Pitt's Daughter Shiloh Choreographs Dance at Fashion Dinner
articles.description: Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt's daughter Shiloh choreographed a steamy dance number under the name Shi at a Hollywood event for designer Isabel Marant.
articles.content:
Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt’s daughter Shiloh Jolie made an unexpected appearance at a dinner Thursday night in Los Angeles that celebrated the launch of French designer Isabel Marant’s capsule collection with Net-A-Porter.

articles.title: Open Letter Urging Tonys to Disinvite Patti LuPone Gets 500 Signatures
articles.description: 500 Broadway performers have signed an open letter urging the Tonys to bar Patti LuPone, after she made controversial comments about Audra McDonald.
articles.content: Broadway performers and theater professionals are calling on the producers of the Tony Awards to disinvite Patti LuPone from the show after the theater legend made controversial remarks about Audra McDonald and “Hell’s Kitchen” star Kecia Lewis in an... [3149 chars]
